2. Read the text below and answer the questions!
My name is Dinl. I use the web only on weekends. I
visit a lot of websites. My favorites websites are
game websites and science websites. I'd like to
know about all the latest Inventions. I like science
very much. Someday, I want to be a scientist.
a. What does Dini want to be?
b. What kind of websites does she like?
c When does she visit the websites ?
d Why does she visit the science website ?
3. What is the object?
a. It is for writing letters on the white board. It is
b. They are for cutting things. It is
C. It is for sharpening your pencil. It is
d. It is for sweeping the floor. It is
I'm proud of my school. Our teachers are smart. We have
many good books and magazines in our school library. The
classrooms are not big, and they are clean and tidy. But, the
school yard is very small. There are not many plants, so it is
very hot in the afternoon.
What Siti likes and does not like about her school:
Things she likes
Things she does not
(like
1.
2.
2.
5. Fill in the blanks with has or have.
a. They
b. She
C. Does Bobby
d. Rabbits
fluty fur.
a big dog.
a fish?
long ears​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. a) funny

b) shy

c) energetic

d) selfish

2. a) a scientist

b) game websites and science websites

c) only on weekends

d) because she like science and she want to be a scientist someday

3. a) marker

b) scissors / knife

c) sharpener

d) broom

4. things siti likes:

  • the teachers are smart
  • there are many good books and magazines in siti's school library
  • the classrooms are clean and tidy

things siti doesn't like:

  • the school yard is very small
  • there are not many plants, so it is very hot in the afternoon.

5. a. they have....

b. she has....

c. does Bobby has....

d. rabbits have....

e. a big dog has....

f. a fish has....

semoga terbantu, maap kalo salah✌

Jawaban:

1)

a. funny

b. shy

c. energetic

d. selfish

2)

a. Dini wants to be a scientist

b. She likes game websites and science websites

c. She visited the websites only on weekends

d. Because she'd like to know about all the latest inventions

3)

a.  a boardmarker

b. knives

c. a sharpener

d. a broom

4) She likes smart teachers and clean and tidy classroom.

She doesn't like small classroom, yard that is not green, and hot temperature.

5(

a. have

b. has

c. has

d. have

6) (Fluty???? is a sound of a flute or fluffy fur : covered with fur)

27. Desi    "Do you mind if I use your pen to sign
this paper?"
"Just a moment. I haven't finished
writing my curriculum vitae."
Arif
What does the woman want?
A To borrow a pen.
B. To buy some paper,
C. To write an article.
D. To ask his paper,
E. To finish her writing​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A

Penjelasan:

Artinya

Apakah kamu tidak keberatan kalau aku pinjam pulpen kamu buat tandatangani kertas ini?

Jawaban:

A.To borrow a pen

Penjelasan:

Desi ingin meminjam pena milik arif tapi,

Arif sedang menggunakan penanya untuk menyelesaikan tugasnya.

related_questions.question:
EXERCISE FIVE    Give questions :-
?
1. Where
?
The two women lived in the same house.
2. How many
They each had a child.
?
3. What happened
It happened that one of the children died one night.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. Where did the two women live?

2. How many child they have each?

3. What happened one night?

Penjelasan:

1. Kalimat dalam past tense, jadi pertanyaan menggunakan kata kerja did setelah kata tanya.

2. Menanyakan jumlah. Yang menjadi obyek dengan jumlah ditanyakan adalah 'a child'. Subyeknya adalah they yang merupakan kata ganti jamak, jadi kata kerja di pertanyaan menggunakan have.

3. Yang ditanyakan adalah apa, jadi peristiwa yang menjadi jawaban tidak disebutkan di pertanyaan.
